noRoleMatched: No matching role found. Please contact support.
failedToSend: Failed to send your question. Please try again.
errorOccurred: An error occurred while sending your question.
passwordResetInfo: External authentication (e.g. Microsoft login) requires you to go through their process of forgetting a password. To do this, click “Forgot my password” during the login process.
darkModeInfo: You can toggle dark mode in the Settings page. Your preference will be saved across sessions.
accessReportsInfo: Reports are available from the Dashboard Page based on your role. Just click on a report to open it.
exportStatsInfo: Exporting is available on some of our tables. To do this, hover over the table, find the three dots button. Click it and select export data. A pop up will come up and go through the process to download the data.
updateAccountInfo: Account information (name, team, role) is currently managed by Nextplaystats@outlook.com. For changes, please send us an email.
logoutInfo: Use the Logout option in the dropdown menu in the top-right corner of any page.
unknownTeamInfo: This means your Microsoft profile does not include a job title or team assignment. Contact nextplaystats@outlook.com so we can update your profile in Microsoft 365.
reportErrorInfo: Try refreshing the page or logging out and back in. If the problem persists, contact nextplaystats@outlook.com with a screenshot and a description of the issue.
submitFeedbackInfo: Use the “Ask a Question” box on this page or email support at nextplaystats@outlook.com.
